title: @Riot, I want your coolest Rioters to comment here.
body:
We need to know who's part of the cool kids club. Players allowed, but only the coolest Rioters are allowed to be here.

This is very important and commenting here will not be considered wasting time as it is essential for every cool Rioter to report in.

(Trainer) Riot Rainslight has reported in.

replies.body:
Reav3, Meddler, Laboka, Jaredan, Rainslight, KateyKhaos, Repertoir, CertainlyT, Shurelia, Schmuk, Ryze, Riot Eambo -Fuck I'm still too lazy to finish this list...

**Just because someone is not on the list yet doesn't mean he/she does not belong on the list. Please don't start a Witch hunt that'll end up in me burning alive :(**
WOOOOOOOOW. I SEE HOW IT IS. NOT EVEN IN THE TOP 4

"associate gameplay capture artist"

capture artist? so you are the one who sheperds all the rioters around the campus so they can catch pokèmons on pokèmon go? :O

i am jesting <3

Oh I wish I was that kind of Capture Artist, but then I'd rather be called "Professional Pokemon Master". 

...Maybe one day...
oh boy. i got caught out in the rain trying to catch pokemon today. it was not fun
Did you get any water types?
Must have been the salt water types.
nope. i just got really wet.
That sucks.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AbPl0bVL,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-07-10T22:41:53.710+0000)
>
> WOOOOOOOOW. I SEE HOW IT IS. NOT EVEN IN THE TOP 4

i love you LOL
I love me too
Rainslight, we have some things to discuss regarding what you did to our cool kids club banner with a permanent sharpie...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AbPl0bVL,comment-id=0003000100010000,timestamp=2016-07-11T00:45:25.174+0000)
>
> I love me too

How much draven do you play
WHERE IS KATEY AT???? SHES THE BEST.
WOOOOOOOOOOW

babe
I guess you can say you were more than a bit Rainslightly offended, huh?

http://m.quickmeme.com/img/74/747d726d711ef0612c70e1fa27c362a568cf7ead2944630e890a556a80c1ce9b.jpg
MHMMMM. A LIKELY STORY. I SEE HOW IT IS!
I demand you post an anime speed-drawing of yours here. Or I will hate you for eternity. And that won't be cool.
http://i.imgur.com/IZKhfL7.gif
What about Repertoir and CertainlyT? They're pretty influential
Yo I heard that this "Rainslight" guy kicks puppies, steals candy, and approved fizz's e.
https://cdn1.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/Mgth0nADyp5bFnp4SNjuuRAZFXw=/cdn0.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/4179064/Its_true_all_of_it.0.gif
RainSlight, I believe you need a paycheck. Someone tell meddler, he needs a paycheck OR YOU WON'T STOP WITH KICKING PUPPIES! @MEDDLER GIVE HIM THE GODDAMN PAYCHECK!
Meddler still hasn't claimed his cookie.

You forgot our lord and savior RiotRepertoir.

Am disappoint

What if they're too cool for your thread

http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Deal-With-It-Sunglasses-08.png
Impossible. This is THE coolest thread. There is no cool factor limit.
http://i.imgur.com/yNlQWRMr.jpg
Hm... my internet won't let me open the gif or see it, so I need you to explain it to me without using the word "mitochondria."

that's a "y tho" image, and the main powerhouse of the cell.
https://media1.giphy.com/media/xTiTno1ju4OXEUL5Sg/200w.gif

To your image, I reply: 
http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/d/d0/360Wynaut.png/250px-360Wynaut.png
Where in that is mitochondria mentioned
''the powerhouse of the cell''
C-Can I be cool too? ;~;
that name tho

No one is cool on the boards, excluding me obviously... So, this post is invalid. Please take it down or I will be consulting my lawyer because you're a racist and I am offended. Simple. I can milk you of all your $$$ and your earnings. Don't test me.
(Waits patiently for the Riot Eambo to comment.)
More upvotes! We must promote the cool kids' club!
As a (hopefully) future Rioter i feel like i should comment here.

If they were still rioters I'd list Iron Stylus and Penguin. Instead I'll list KateyKhaos(though she's grieving right now so she may not show up), Jaredan, Meddler, Repetoir, Baconhawk, and Bioluminescence.
What happened to her?
Her cat, Rengar, passed away.
Aww.
